title: Processes - Area between Curves - Functions of y

content.question: Let <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graphs of <math alttext="x equals, y squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals 2 y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown in the figure above. What is the area of <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
